metadata.description: Cross-platform offline-first mobile/desktop app for construction inspectors
metadata.session_notes: Session 362: Root cause analysis of 134 boilerplate rows. RC1: anti-aliased grid line bleed (155/162 pipes at grid positions). Designed adaptive whitespace-scan insets. Next: implement fix in text_recognizer_v2.dart, regenerate fixtures.

current_phase.phase_name: Pipeline Architecture: Cell-Level OCR Quality Tuning

active_blockers.title: Split rows: price data on separate row from item — only 22% of items have unit_price
active_blockers.notes: Root cause identified: anti-aliased grid line fringes produce 155 pipe artifacts that block V3 price continuation detection. Fix: adaptive whitespace-scan insets in text_recognizer_v2.dart. Expected: ~70 boilerplate→priceContinuation.
active_blockers.impact: Grid line bleed is the #1 upstream cause. Fixing insets should recover ~70 price continuation rows and cascade improvements to all downstream stages.

dependencies_at_risk.issue: Deprecated APIs used for field mapping (Syncfusion migrating to new API surface)
dependencies_at_risk.action_needed: Audit before next upgrade, test IDR template field mapping

dependencies_at_risk.issue: Platform channel timeout issues on some devices (GitHub issues open)

team_context.work_style: Orchestration-based (user defines plans, Claude executes with agents)
